sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../../../App.css' import '../../../../Styles/Dashboard.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' export default function DashboardRecentOrders(props) { const recentOrder = props.recentOrder; console.log(recentOrder) return (

{props.title}

{recentOrder && recentOrder.map((item, index)=>{ return(
#{item.orderId} by {item.orderName}
{ (item.ratingHours && item.ratingMinutes) &&

{item.ratingHours}:

{item.ratingMinutes}

} { (!item.ratingHours && !item.ratingMinutes) &&

{item.ratingYears}/

{item.ratingMonths}/

{item.ratingDays}

}

Amount:

{item.orderList.length}

) }) }
) }
